base_description: Black rectangular briefcase with metallic handle.
part_description: The briefcase has a main compartment, a metallic handle on top, and two silver clasps. It is rectangular with rounded edges and appears to be medium-sized.
internal_interaction_description: The metallic handle is centrally positioned on the top, providing a balanced grip. The two clasps secure the briefcase shut, interacting with the edges of the main compartment to keep it closed. The hinges on the opposite side allow the briefcase to open and close smoothly.
external_interaction_description: The briefcase can be carried by a person using the handle, allowing for easy transport. It can be placed on flat surfaces and fits under desks or in overhead compartments. The clasps interact with external forces to prevent accidental opening.
